summary: AN ORDINANCE amending sections 3, 6, 7, 12 and 18 of the Housing Preservation Ordinance (109220) as amended by Ordinance 109432, to exempt certain housing units from the ordinance, authorizing the Director of the Department of Construction and Land Use to compute The Housing Cost Index based upon information gathered from various sources, providing relocation assistance to certain tenants evicted prior to an application for a demolition license, establishing the demolition license fee in the Metropolitan Business (BM) Zone, and establishing penalties for violations.
